item.description:
WODS Oldies In Concert - KC & The Sunshine Band

Saturday, Aug 16 7:00p to 9:30p
at DCR Hatch Memorial Shell, Boston, MA

Thanks to Helen K for organizing this event:
"I thought we could meet around 3ish or 4 and have a picinc on the Charles. People could bring rollerblades, games or anything they want to do or just walk along the Charles also if everyone brought something to eat and a blanket."

Please post your plans under your reply and any additional comments or questions right on the website under "Share your excitement about this meetup. Post a comment." Your message will show on the website for everyone to read and respond to.
If you wish to exchange cell numbers or have specific questions you can go to Helen's profile and email her directly from there: http://singles.meetup...
Sounds like a good time.

For directions and transportation options: http://www.hatchshell...
item.how_to_find_us: TBD -check back or email Helen before the event

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: K C and the Sunshine Band
